subject: Sales
title: Niche Down to Scale Up
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Niche Down to Scale Up.

hook.text: A marketing agency for 'everyone' struggles. One serving only dentists becomes a ten-million-dollar firm.

buildup.text: Specialization narrows the audience but deepens expertise, trust, and referral power enormously.

discovery.text: Niche brands command premium pricing. Generalists compete on cost. Specialists compete on expertise.

twist.text: Narrowing feels like leaving money behind. In practice, it focuses effort where returns multiply.

climax.text: Pick a niche you understand deeply. Dominate it first. Then expand from a position of strength.

punchline.text: Go narrow first. Scale comes from depth, not breadth.

quiz.question: Why does niching down often lead to more revenue?
options: Deep expertise commands premium pricing and stronger referrals
